item.description:
Hi Trailblazers! We know that some of us singles won't be spending Thanksgiving with family, so we'd like to invite some of you to a singles Thanksgiving dinner (buffet-style).

We've decided to have a potluck Thanksgiving Dinner at Debbie's house in Kingston, NH, a walk after dinner, and maybe play some board games. Debbie's house is right on Powwow Pond, and there is a kayak available if anyone wants to go out on the pond. We will cook the turkey and provide plates, cups, flatware, napkins, etc. We ask that you bring a prepared dish such as stuffing, vegetables, cranberry sauce, bread, dessert. Please specify what you'd like to bring so we can coordinate the food.

After dinner and a short walk, we can socialize around the outdoor fireplace (chiminea) and toast marshmallows.

We will also post this event on Social Fun, so get your RSVP in early.

The address, directions, and Debbie's cell # will be sent the day before Thanksgiving to those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Thanksgiving Potluck Dinner
